org.araneaframework.http.util
Class EncodingUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.http.util.EncodingUtil
public abstract class EncodingUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Provides base64 encoding, decoding methods, generating a digest and checking the digest methods.

Author:

EncodingUtil

Method Detail

encodeObjectBase64

public static java.lang.String encodeObjectBase64(java.io.Serializable object,
                                                  boolean compress)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
The method serializes the object, optionally compresses it and base64 encodes. GZip is used for the optional compression. The method uses streams for the different operations and the underlying base64 algorithm is from iHarder.net base64 utilities..

Parameters:
object - that will be encoded.
compress - if set, the serialized object will be compressed.
Returns:
A String represtation of the object in base64 encoded format.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

decodeObjectBase64

public static java.lang.Object decodeObjectBase64(java.lang.String value,
                                                  boolean compress)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Base64 decodes the value, optionally decompresses it and then deserializes it. For the decompression GZip is expected.

Parameters:
value - is the base64 encoded data of the optionally compressed serialized object.
compress - determines if after the decoding gzip decompression should be applied.
Returns:
an Object that is deserialized object of the decoded optionally decompressed value.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

buildDigest

public static byte[] buildDigest(byte[] data)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Builds a digest of the byte array, using the SHA hash function.

Parameters:
data - the byte array that's digest we are building.
Returns:
A byte[] array representing the SHA hash.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

checkDigest

public static boolean checkDigest(byte[] value,
                                  byte[] digest)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Returns true, if the digest of the value equals to the given digest.

Parameters:
value - byte array that's digest we are comparing.
digest - the allready generated digest we are comparing against.
Returns:
true if the digest of the value equals digest, otherwise false.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
